description.narrative: UNICEF Sierra Leone staff and partners are provided the guidance, tools and resources to effectively communicate, advocate and develop partnerships regarding child rights issues with stakeholders., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The Sierra Leone Country Programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality results based management standards to achieve results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF Sierra Leone staff and partners are provided the guidance, tools and resources to effectively communicate, advocate and develop partnerships regarding child rights issues with stakeholders.
